channel.title: Need a hoster for my server!(Pictures inside!)
channel.description:
Hi guys, I Coded my server before 1 mounth ago, i opened it for 1 mounth and i am bored i need a Hoster to host it and help me, For any information here is the forums * and my msn is rc_ronaldinho@hotmail.com Here is some pictures if you are interested in knowing how does the server look like :)
